verses.verse: בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <S%H1648><s%> Gershon קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> and Merari

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons קְהָ֑ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <S%H6019><s%> Amram יִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3324><s%> Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <S%H5816><s%> and Uzziel ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children עַמְרָ֔ם <S%H6019><s%> of Amram אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses וּמִרְיָ֑ם <S%H4813><s%> and Miriam ס וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> also of Aaron נָדָב֙ <S%H5070><s%> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar ס

אֶלְעָזָר֙ <S%H499><s%> Eleazar הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּֽינְחָ֔ס <S%H6372><s%> Phinehas פִּֽינְחָ֖ס <S%H6372><s%> Phinehas הֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִישֽׁוּעַ׃ <S%H50><s%> Abishua

וַאֲבִישׁ֙וּעַ֙ <S%H50><s%> And Abishua הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֻּקִּ֔י <S%H1231><s%> Bukki וּבֻקִּ֖י <S%H1231><s%> and Bukki הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻזִּֽי׃ <S%H5813><s%> Uzzi

וְעֻזִּי֙ <S%H5813><s%> And Uzzi הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְרַֽחְיָ֔ה <S%H2228><s%> Zerahiah וּֽזְרַֽחְיָ֖ה <S%H2228><s%> and Zerahiah הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְרָיֽוֹת׃ <S%H4812><s%> Meraioth

מְרָיוֹת֙ <S%H4812><s%> Meraioth הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲמַרְיָ֔ה <S%H568><s%> Amariah וַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <S%H568><s%> and Amariah הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <S%H285><s%> Ahitub

וַאֲחִיטוּב֙ <S%H285><s%> And Ahitub הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צָד֔וֹק <S%H6659><s%> Zadok וְצָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִימָֽעַץ׃ <S%H290><s%> Ahimaaz

וַאֲחִימַ֙עַץ֙ <S%H290><s%> And Ahimaaz הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲזַרְיָ֔ה <S%H5838><s%> Azariah וַעֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹחָנָֽן׃ <S%H3110><s%> Johanan

וְיוֹחָנָ֖ן <S%H3110><s%> And Johanan הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲזַרְיָ֑ה <S%H5838><s%> Azariah ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who כִּהֵ֔ן <S%H3547><s%> (he [it is] that executed the priest's office בַּבַּ֕יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the temple אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> that Solomon בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> begat עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲמַרְיָ֑ה <S%H568><s%> Amariah וַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <S%H568><s%> and Amariah הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <S%H285><s%> Ahitub

וַאֲחִיטוּב֙ <S%H285><s%> And Ahitub הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צָד֔וֹק <S%H6659><s%> Zadok וְצָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁלּֽוּם׃ <S%H7967><s%> Shallum

וְשַׁלּוּם֙ <S%H7967><s%> And Shallum הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חִלְקִיָּ֔ה <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah וְחִלְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2518><s%> and Hilkiah הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H5838><s%> Azariah

וַעֲזַרְיָה֙ <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂרָיָ֔ה <S%H8304><s%> Seraiah וּשְׂרָיָ֖ה <S%H8304><s%> and Seraiah הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹצָדָֽק׃ <S%H3087><s%> Jehozadak

וִיהוֹצָדָ֣ק <S%H3087><s%> And Jehozadak הָלַ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went בְּהַגְל֣וֹת <S%H1540><s%> carried away יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [into captivity] when the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by the hand נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּֽר׃ <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar ס
בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi גֵּרְשֹׁ֕ם <S%H1647><s%> Gershom קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> and Merari

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And these [be] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹם <S%H1647><s%> of Gershom לִבְנִ֥י <S%H3845><s%> Libni וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons קְהָ֑ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <S%H6019><s%> [were] Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3324><s%> and Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <S%H5816><s%> and Uzziel

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מְרָרִ֖י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <S%H4249><s%> Mahli וּמֻשִׁ֑י <S%H4187><s%> and Mushi וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> And these [are] the families הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites לַאֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> according to their fathers

לְֽגֵרְשׁ֑וֹם <S%H1647><s%> Of Gershom לִבְנִ֥י <S%H3845><s%> Libni בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יַ֥חַת <S%H3189><s%> Jahath בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son זִמָּ֥ה <S%H2155><s%> Zimmah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

יוֹאָ֤ח <S%H3098><s%> Joah בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son עִדּ֣וֹ <S%H5714><s%> Iddo בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son זֶ֥רַח <S%H2226><s%> Zerah בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יְאָתְרַ֥י <S%H2979><s%> Jeaterai בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons קְהָ֑ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath עַמִּינָדָ֣ב <S%H5992><s%> Amminadab בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son קֹ֥רַח <S%H7141><s%> Korah בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אַסִּ֥יר <S%H617><s%> Assir בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
אֶלְקָנָ֥ה <S%H511><s%> Elkanah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְאֶבְיָסָ֥ף <S%H43><s%> and Ebiasaph בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְאַסִּ֥יר <S%H617><s%> and Assir בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

תַּ֤חַת <S%H8480><s%> Tahath בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son אוּרִיאֵ֣ל <S%H222><s%> Uriel בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son עֻזִּיָּ֥ה <S%H5818><s%> Uzziah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְשָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Shaul בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <S%H511><s%> of Elkanah עֲמָשַׂ֖י <S%H6022><s%> Amasai וַאֲחִימֽוֹת׃ <S%H287><s%> and Ahimoth

אֶלְקָנָ֑ה <S%H511><s%> [As for] Elkanah [בְּנֹו כ] (בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son ק) אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <S%H511><s%> of Elkanah צוֹפַ֥י <S%H6689><s%> Zophai בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> the sons וְנַ֥חַת <S%H5184><s%> and Nahath בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
אֱלִיאָ֥ב <S%H446><s%> Eliab בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יְרֹחָ֥ם <S%H3395><s%> Jeroham בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֶלְקָנָ֥ה <S%H511><s%> Elkanah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
וּבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <S%H8050><s%> of Samuel הַבְּכֹ֥ר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn וַשְׁנִ֖י <S%H2059><s%> Vashni וַאֲבִיָּֽה׃ <S%H29><s%> and Abiah ס

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מְרָרִ֖י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari מַחְלִ֑י <S%H4249><s%> Mahli לִבְנִ֥י <S%H3845><s%> Libni בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> Shimei בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son עֻזָּ֥ה <S%H5798><s%> Uzza בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
שִׁמְעָ֥א <S%H8092><s%> Shimea בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son חַגִּיָּ֥ה <S%H2293><s%> Haggiah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <S%H6222><s%> Asaiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son פ

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶעֱמִ֥יד <S%H5975><s%> set דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> And these [are they] whom David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְדֵי־ <S%H3027><s%> over the service שִׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> of song בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִמְּנ֖וֹחַ <S%H4494><s%> had rest הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <S%H727><s%> after that the ark

וַיִּהְי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מְשָׁרְתִ֜ים <S%H8334><s%> And they ministered לִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before מִשְׁכַּ֤ן <S%H4908><s%> the dwelling אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> place of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation בַּשִּׁ֔יר <S%H7892><s%> with singing עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בְּנ֧וֹת <S%H1129><s%> had built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> until Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וַיַּעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> and [then] they waited כְמִשְׁפָּטָ֖ם <S%H4941><s%> according to their order עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according עֲבוֹדָתָֽם׃ <S%H5656><s%> on their office

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> And these [are] they that waited וּבְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1121><s%> with their children מִבְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֔י <S%H6956><s%> of the Kohathites הֵימָן֙ <S%H1968><s%> Heman הַמְשׁוֹרֵ֔ר <S%H7891><s%> a singer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאֵ֖ל <S%H3100><s%> of Joel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> of Shemuel

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son אֶלְקָנָה֙ <S%H511><s%> of Elkanah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֱלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H447><s%> of Eliel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son תּֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H8430><s%> of Toah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son [צִיף כ] (צוּף֙ <S%H6689><s%> Zophai ק) בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <S%H511><s%> of Elkanah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַ֖חַת <S%H4287><s%> of Mahath בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲמָשָֽׂי׃ <S%H6022><s%> of Amasai

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son אֶלְקָנָה֙ <S%H511><s%> of Elkanah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאֵ֔ל <S%H3100><s%> of Joel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> of Azariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְפַנְיָֽה׃ <S%H6846><s%> of Zephaniah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son תַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H8480><s%> of Tahath בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַסִּ֔יר <S%H617><s%> of Assir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶבְיָסָ֖ף <S%H43><s%> of Ebiasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> of Korah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son יִצְהָ֣ר <S%H3324><s%> of Izhar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קְהָ֔ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְאָחִ֣יו <S%H251><s%> And his brother אָסָ֔ף <S%H623><s%> Asaph הָעֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> who stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> on his right hand אָסָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> [even] Asaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בֶּרֶכְיָ֖הוּ <S%H1296><s%> of Berachiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שִׁמְעָֽא׃ <S%H8092><s%> of Shimea
